lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about the influence of poor weather on the World Series through the years misstated the scheduled day for Game 6 between the Boston Red Sox and the Cincinnati Reds in October 1975. It was a Saturday, not a Friday. (Stormy weather ultimately pushed the game to Tuesday.).
